title: Paul Newman
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture actors and actresses - Biography
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Newman, Paul, 1925-
Music & Performing Arts/Motion picture actors and actresses - Biography
People/Motion picture actors and actresses - Biography
description: Episode of Series "Hollywood remembers". His films have won acclaim throughout the world and his star continues to shine brightly, undimmed by the many years since his first film appearance. The film career of Paul Newman is the stuff dreams are made of. Clips from some of Newman's greatest films are featured as well as rare home movie footage of the actor relaxing at home, meeting his public and working on the set. This informative and fascinating program brings the viewer deep into the inner world of this brilliant and enigmatic artist. Contains some b & w sequences.
